title: fragment: CHH-3
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-source= --]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|bg-color=rgb(255, 174, 163)
|txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
|border-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-bg-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|bg-color=rgb(135, 107, 100)
|txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
|border-color=rgb(74, 61, 58)
|label-bg-color=rgb(74, 61, 58)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-source= --]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-3
|bg-color=rgb(255, 174, 163)
|txt-color=rgb(212, 48, 15)
|border-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-bg-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
I really think we should get dessert.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-3/F.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
I'm not a fan of sweets.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

A moment of awkward silence passes.

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-3/B.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-3
|unique-name=name-3
|display-name=Epon
]]
I want to go on a walk.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

He seems to really want what he wants. To be fair, you're the same way.

A few moments pass.

You now agree that going on a walk is a better idea.

The two of you begin to stroll through the park. You don't know why you agreed to do this. You would have rather got desert. If you have to do this, it would at least be nice to get some leche flan.

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-3/E.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
I'm glad I chose this park. I like the duck pond. I've always loved animals.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
Do you have any pets?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-3/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
Ah, no. I don't really have time for pets. At my old job, I got to see some really cool animals, though. I've always wanted a really weird pet. Like a crab. This girl I knew at my old job had two pet crabs.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

You found it interesting that that's what he decided to bring up about his old job.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
What was your old job?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-3/E.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-3
|unique-name=name-3
|display-name=Epon
]]
Ah, I worked at an exotic animal rescue.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

That was quite a stretch. This answer gave you a strange feeling, but you didn't know what it was.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
Oh, that's cool.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-3/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
Yeah. Maybe I can go back someday.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

His expression was complicated.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
Why did you leave?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-3/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
There were... some administrative choices I disagreed with.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

You two were silent for a moment.

He seems to miss working at the Foundation.

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-3/E.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
So, what do you do for work?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/capture-hi-s-heart-m/offset/3 | Tell a half truth]]]

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/capture-hi-s-heart-m/offset/5| Turn the question back on him]]]
author: Mew-ltiverse
